title: Pythagorean triples
shortDescription: Write a function that detects pythagorean triples.
description: Write a function that takes in 3 integers a, b, and c and returns 1 if they are pythagorean triples and 0 if they are not. Note: you may use the 'sqrt' function from 'math.h', and c will always be the potential hypotenuse.
